mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fratson's Future; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 31; "Fratson's Future. Free Pardon Not Expected at Present."; A pardon is not expected for George Fratson, sentenced to death for murder, even though his counsel and solicitor have been fighting hard for his life. However, a reprieve was granted by Home Office.; Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Evidence, Criminal
